EmailTemplate.name: Open Starbucks 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, Sign up to 'Open Starbucks' NOW!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN STARBUCK'S TOP BUSINESS LEADERS, MEET DIRECTORS AND LEARN WHAT IT TAKES TO WORK FOR A MULTI MILLION POUND ORGANISATION!
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Starbucks are opening their doors to NCS Grads for one day only to give you the chance to take an exclusive peek behind the scenes, and learn what it takes to run a global company like Starbucks!
If you are interested in attending respond to this email ASAP and we will send you a letter to excuse you from school!
Details:
- When? Friday 22nd April: 10am - 4pm.
- Where? Wembley Civic Centre. Engineers Way. HA9 0FJ
- If you need a letter from us at TCS to get out of school for this event then please feel free to email us and we will send you one over!
Feel free to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org if you have any questions or queries.
Ola Awosika
Graduate Programme Associate Manager - South West London
The Challenge
